What happened?\""},{"lineNumber":118534,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはそっとシャロンから離れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance quietly moved away from Sharon."},{"lineNumber":118535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、やめとく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I'll stop...\""},{"lineNumber":118536,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか……もういい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Somehow... it's enough already...\""},{"lineNumber":118537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、どうかいたしました？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe, what’s the matter?\""},{"lineNumber":118538,"originalJapaneseLine":"「上手く言えんが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I can't explain it well, but...\""},{"lineNumber":118539,"originalJapaneseLine":"　君、俺相手にしとるとき……","translatedEnglishLine":"When you’re dealing with me...\""},{"lineNumber":118540,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっとも笑わんな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You don’t smile at all...\""},{"lineNumber":118541,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":118542,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うふふ、不思議なことを仰るお方」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ufufu, you're saying mysterious things.\""},{"lineNumber":118543,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクが復活してから、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since Kessellink’s resurrection,"},{"lineNumber":118544,"originalJapaneseLine":"すぐのこと――","translatedEnglishLine":"shortly afterwards—"},{"lineNumber":118545,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクの部屋にシャロンが来ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sharon came to Kessellink's room."},{"lineNumber":118546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":118547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……どうぞ、ケッセルリンク様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Please, Lord only the movement of Kessellink’s hand holding the glass,"},{"lineNumber":118550,"originalJapaneseLine":"シャロンはまるで心が読めるように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Sharon, as if she could read his say...\""},{"lineNumber":118559,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様の為に行うことを、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What we do for Lord trouble.\""},{"lineNumber":118561,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私がいない間、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"While I was gone,"},{"lineNumber":118562,"originalJapaneseLine":"　大事なかったか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"did nothing serious happen?\""},{"lineNumber":118563,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There was.\""},{"lineNumber":118564,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう……なにかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What was it?\""},{"lineNumber":118565,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私が寂しいと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That I was lonely...\""},{"lineNumber":118566,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう思っていました」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's what was thought.\""},{"lineNumber":118567,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":118568,"originalJapaneseLine":"ケッセルリンクがわずかに目を開く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kessellink slightly opened his eyes."},{"lineNumber":118569,"originalJapaneseLine":"その色にはかすかに驚きの色があった。","translatedEnglishLine":"There was a faint look of surprise in his eyes."},{"lineNumber":118570,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":118571,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":118572,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh...\""},{"lineNumber":118573,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うふふ、笑ってしまいますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ufufu, it makes me laugh.\""},{"lineNumber":118574,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私も……死に至る刹那……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even I... at the moment before death..."},{"lineNumber":118575,"originalJapaneseLine":"　面白いものを見つけた」","translatedEnglishLine":"found something interesting.\""},{"lineNumber":118576,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、なんでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, what is it?\""},{"lineNumber":118577,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残していく、君達への罪の意識」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A lingering guilt toward all of you.\""},{"lineNumber":118578,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well...\""},{"lineNumber":118579,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fufu...\""},{"lineNumber":118580,"originalJapaneseLine":"「存外……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Surprisingly..."},{"lineNumber":118581,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お互い人間らしい感情が","translatedEnglishLine":"humane feelings still remain between us somewhere."},{"lineNumber":118582,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだどこかに残っていたようだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it seems some still remain.\""},{"lineNumber":118583,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、そのようで」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, it appears so.\""},{"lineNumber":118584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「涙も心も、とうに枯れ果てたかと……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I thought our tears and hearts had long since dried up..."},{"lineNumber":118585,"originalJapaneseLine":"「日々の出来事に心を動かされることなく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Unaffected by the daily events,"},{"lineNumber":118586,"originalJapaneseLine":"　安寧に包まれた日々を過ごすだけ……","translatedEnglishLine":"we were just spending peaceful days wrapped in calm..."},{"lineNumber":118587,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうだった筈なのですがね」","translatedEnglishLine":"That was supposed to be the case, but.\""},{"lineNumber":118588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":118589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ケッセルリンク様……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Kessellink..."},{"lineNumber":118590,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私が今から言うワガママを、","translatedEnglishLine":"Please allow me to say selfishly what I am about to say,\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはそっとシャロンから離れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance quietly moved away from Sharon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 君、俺相手にしとるとき……
「うふふ、不思議なことを仰るお方」
ケッセルリンクが復活してから、
ケッセルリンクの部屋にシャロンが来ていた。
ケッセルリンクがグラスを持つ手の動きだけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With only the movement of Kessellink’s hand holding the glass,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シャロンはまるで心が読めるように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sharon, as if she could read his mind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ワインをそっと注ぎ入れた。
グラスを傾けて、深紅の液体を飲み干す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tilting the glass, he drank the deep crimson liquid dry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度はシャロンは動かない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, Sharon did not move.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは音を立てず
グラスをテーブルに置いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: placed the glass on the table.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前達には随分と苦労をかけたな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have caused you all quite a lot of trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッセルリンク様の為に行うことを、
苦労だなどとは呼びません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we would never call it trouble."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクがわずかに目を開く。
その色にはかすかに驚きの色があった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There was a faint look of surprise in his eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うふふ、笑ってしまいますね」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Even I... at the moment before death...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白いものを見つけた」
「残していく、君達への罪の意識」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A lingering guilt toward all of you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お互い人間らしい感情が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: humane feelings still remain between us somewhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだどこかに残っていたようだな」
「涙も心も、とうに枯れ果てたかと……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I thought our tears and hearts had long since dried up...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「日々の出来事に心を動かされることなく、
安寧に包まれた日々を過ごすだけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we were just spending peaceful days wrapped in calm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだった筈なのですがね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was supposed to be the case, but."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私が今から言うワガママを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please allow me to say selfishly what I am about to say,"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
